doc.previous: In addition to bases under its operational control, SAC also maintained tenant wings at several bases under the control of other USAF MAJCOMs. These non-SAC bases with SAC tenants included Amarillo AFB, Texas; Eglin AFB, Florida; Lowry AFB, Colorado; Mather AFB, California; Robins AFB, Georgia; Seymour Johnson AFB, North Carolina; Sheppard AFB, Texas; and Wright-Patterson AFB, Ohio. SAC also often maintained a presence at former SAC bases that the command subsequently relinquished to other MAJCOMs, to include but not limited to Altus AFB, Oklahoma; MacDill AFB, Florida; Homestead AFB, Florida; and Travis AFB, California.
